channel.title: Pernix: Legendary server with countless updates
channel.description: [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KsJHGljOZy0[/youtube] Welcome to Pernix! We are an economy based server with a large range of skills, bosses, minigames and a proud Pking community We pride ourself on being a friendly and welcoming community, our staff are friendly and committed to making you feel at home. Our servers are stable and online 100% of the time. Pernix is one of a kind, it is guaranteed you will not find another server like this one.
